hof.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Player>

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    Represents the Player. In this class every important information about the player is stored.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Player(java.lang.String name, java.net.InetAddress ip, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Main-Constructor
      Creates a new Player with the given name, the InetAddress and assigns him the given color
